description:
<p>This is a really great opportunity for either a newly qualified Band 5 RMN or a more experienced Band 6 RMN looking to move from another specialty into community CAMHS. Over a two year period there will be extensive on the job training accompanied by relevant courses where on completion the successful candidate will have the skills and experience to deliver a Specialist CAMHS Practitioner role at band 7. This approach has been adopted by a number of Trusts in order to help develop and sustain a nursing workforce in CAMHS and is supported by NHS England via the CAPITAL nurse programme.</p>
<p> </p>
title: CAMHS Mental Health Nurse
